text: New discoveries like this one makes me realise I'll never get tired of hunting for obscure game soundtracks. Would you ever guess this was composed by none other than Akira Yamaoka? The fact that it's so different from Silent Hill's style but still awesome just shows how talented he is. This was actually a Kickstarter card collecting game in a reimagined Astro Boy universe released in 2017 but later shut down.
author: SupraDarky
